title: 7 More Healthy Years: What We Can Learn from Super Agers

rawLines.text: American healthcare is in crisis. We
have a path to prevention. It isn't
reversing aging. It's just preventing
the age related morbidities of the big
three. It's been a fantasy for
millennia. There should be a reboot, new
standard of care based on intelligent
partitioning of risk. 7 years more of
health span free of the major three
diseases. 7 years. Who wouldn't take
seven years? I hope we'll seize this
opportunity because we may never get
another one like this for a long time.
[Music]
So, you've written this really exciting

wanted to write it, and how you see it
in the context of other books that have

there were a few things that came
